project_metadata.project_name: Správa dotazníků uživatelem/vlastníkom - Survey Management System

executive_summary.business_problem: Manual survey creation and management processes are creating operational inefficiencies, compliance risks, and missed business opportunities across five critical business domains
executive_summary.solution_overview: Integrated Survey Management Platform providing self-service template creation, automated compliance validation, comprehensive audit trails, and cross-system integration
strategic_value: 70% reduction in survey deployment time from 15-25 days to 3-7 days
25% increase in customer feedback response rates through improved survey quality
100% compliance with GDPR and banking regulations through automated validation
15% customer acquisition improvement through survey-informed campaigns
Zero regulatory breaches target through systematic survey governance
executive_summary.investment_justification: ROI demonstrable within 12 months through operational efficiency gains, compliance cost avoidance, and revenue enhancement opportunities

primary_stakeholders.success_criteria: 80% adoption rate within 30 days, self-service survey creation capability
<48h survey approval SLA, 100% compliance review pass rate
Zero fraud incidents above threshold, business continuity readiness
70% deployment time reduction, 99.5% uptime, <2s response time

survey_management: Version control with change tracking and rollback capabilities
compliance_and_governance: Automated privacy impact assessment for all survey templates
GDPR compliance validation with consent mechanism integration
Role-based access control with AD integration
Comprehensive audit trail for all survey activities
Automated compliance approval workflow with <48h SLA
risk_and_security: Risk assessment framework for survey operations
Fraud detection integration with monitoring capabilities
Business continuity planning with 99.5% uptime target
Data loss prevention controls for customer data
Incident response procedures for security events
marketing_integration: Brand guideline enforcement in survey design

performance: <2 second response time for all operations
Concurrent user support for all business users
security: AES-256 encryption for data at rest
TLS 1.3 encryption for data in transit
compliance: GDPR compliance with automated privacy controls
Banking regulation adherence with audit trails
Immutable audit logging with tamper protection
usability: Intuitive interface requiring <3 hours training per user group
Self-service capabilities for non-technical business users
Responsive design supporting desktop and tablet devices
Accessibility compliance for inclusive user experience

infrastructure_requirements.compute: 4 servers (2 prod, 1 staging, 1 dev) with 8 CPU cores, 16GB RAM each
infrastructure_requirements.database: 2 servers (primary/replica) with 16 CPU cores, 32GB RAM, SSD storage
infrastructure_requirements.storage: 500GB initial database, 1TB growth capacity, unlimited cloud archive
